Adam’s Journey with Hyper

“The biggest challenge I faced before joining Hyper was that we knew we wanted to solve a globally scalable problem, but we simply didn’t know how to approach it. We had a great vision but lacked clarity on how to take actionable steps to move forward.

Hyper’s team pushed us to clarify our direction and build an actionable roadmap to market. They provided structure and guidance that helped us refine our focus, streamline our efforts, and understand what we needed to do to scale effectively.

One of the most valuable things I gained from Hyper was learning how to cut through the noise and double down on what truly moved the needle. With their guidance, we were able to sharpen our strategy and execute with confidence. Thanks to this support, we successfully exited the business! Today, Magic Mountain is back on track with a clear strategy and increasing traction.”
